last_episode_to_air.name: Christmas Special
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nigella shares her foolproof guide to stress-free festive cooking and easy entertaining.

name: Simply Nigella
overview: Relaxed, inspiring and as mouthwatering as ever, Nigella Lawson's latest series shows us that what - and how - we cook really can make us feel better and more alive. Packed with new recipes and tips designed to make our lives easier, Nigella proves that whatever the occasion, food, in the eating and the making, should always be pleasurable.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Nigella cooks up her favourite breakfast - a twist on avocado toast with radishes.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Nigella introduces the latest addition to her Chocolate Cake Hall of Fame.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Nigella cooks fluffy oat pancakes with a raspberry and honey syrup.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Nigella bakes cheering chai muffins - light, luscious and dairy-free.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Recipes include a chicken shawarma and a liquorice and blackcurrant chocolate cake.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Nigella's friends are treated to a 'bav and pav' feast for supper.

episodes.name: Christmas Special
episodes.overview: Nigella shares her foolproof guide to stress-free festive cooking and easy entertaining.
